1  
      Resume 
TUYN DOAN 
FullName:      Đoàn Văn Tuyn 
Date of Birth: November 11,1987 
Phone:            098 385 8781 
Fb.me/Latineccentricus 
Email: admin@tuyn.info 
Address : KB5, KP3, Tan Thuan Tay, Dist 7, HCM 
I am an industrious and ambitious person and I always try to work creatively. I draw a line 
between work and pleasure, working hours and leisure time. I do not have much free time, 
but if I have, I prefer to spend it with my family. My favorite way of spending time is 
swimming & watch movie. In computer space, my true passion is new technology. 
OBJECTIVES 
• Deep knowledge of software development. 
• Using foreign language as mother language.  
• Develop my skills with the growth of company and I want to prove myself.  
• Become a Project Manager or CIO.  
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY 
• 9 years experience in the field of Software Development 
• 3 years experience in agile development methodologies and leading a team in an 
Agile/SCRUM environment 
• 2 years experience working with .NET Core 
• 2 years experience in Technical Leader 
• 1 year experience in Product Manager 
• Have skills programing language with .NET framework 
• Have skills of back-end languages and front-end framework 
• Have knowledge of OOP & design patterns 
2  
EDUCATIONAL BACKGROUND 
• 2006 – 2009: Institute Of Informatic Technology & Management    
Practical Software Engineering  
- Professional Web Application Expert          – 2006 
- Professional Software Arrhiterture Expert  – 2007 
- Advance Software Developer Expert           – 2008 
- Enterprise Application Intergrate Expert     – 2009 
• 03/2013 – 07/2013: VTC Academy Specialist Official Certification 
Android Development (High Distinction/A+) 
TECHNICAL SKILLS 
• Databases: MongoDB, MSSQL, PostgreSQL, MySQL, Oracle 
• Languages: C#, .NET Core, ASP.NET, VB, Java, PHP, JavaScript 
• Back-end Frameworks: ASP.NET MVC, Entites Framework, Kong API Gateway & 
Microservice, Devexpress, Syncfusion,… 
• Front-end Frameworks: HTML, CSS, Javascript, Bootstrap, Jquery  
• Cloud System: Google, Amazon, Azure,… 
• Support Tools : Jira, Bitbucket, Confluence, Bamboo (CI), Git, SVN 
EMPLOYMENT HISTORY 
• 05/2010 – 08/2013: Senior Developer at VIETMAP CO., LTD 
• 10/2013 – 11/2014: Product Manager at FELIX TECHNOLOGY JSC., 
• 01/2015 – 07/2017: Senior Technical Assistant at VIETMAP CO., LTD (BU MAPS) 
• 07/2017 – 07/2019: Technical Leader at XTRIP TRAVEL JSC., (VIETMAP GROUP) 
3  
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE 
07/2017 – 07/2019: Technical Leader at XTRIP TRAVEL JSC., (VIETMAP GROUP) 
Xtrip is a Startup Company invested by VietMap Group with the mission of becoming an 
Online Travel Agent (OTA) in the travel marketplace. We together built a travel platform that 
provides a wide range of travel needs, enabling customers to create moments together with 
their loved ones. Xtrip offers flights, hotels, tour packages, attractions & activities. 
In the beginning, I involved in the team to build a working environment that was effective 
and friendly. 
• Setting up developing and productive environments. 
• Using microservice architecture for developments and independently deployments. 
• Development with Agile Method and Scrum. 
• Solution for managing source codes (management of branches).  
• Integration of payment gateways (NAPAS, PAYOO, CyberSource) 
• Analyzing, designing and realizing the business of tourism/flight/hotel/activities 
bookings. 
• Interacted and integrated with the supplier who provided the API of hotel/ flight /  
activities connectivity. 
• Analyzing, designing and developing a CRM system (promotion codes, vouchers, gift 
codes, rewarding points) based on the marketing strategies created by Marketing 
Manager to launch Xtrip successfully to OTA Market. 
• Provides some of useful tools and applications to Customer Service Team for serving 
our customers effectively : Slack notifications/Email sender/SMS sender. 
Technologies and Tools Used: C# .NET Core, ASP.NET MVC, MongoDB, Elastic Stack, 
RabbitMQ, Hangfire, Serilog, Seq, IdentityServer, Firebase, Slack, Odoo, Bamboo (CI), 
Syncfusion. 
Kong API Gateway for Microservice  
Atlassian Product (Jira, Bitbucket, Confluence, Bamboo (CI)) 
PfSense is firewall/router system 
Virtualization infrastructure : VMware vSphere/VMware vCenter Server Appliance 
4  
01/2015 – 07/2017: Senior Technical Assistant at VIETMAP CO., LTD (BU MAPS) 
• Settup CRM Tracking System (SuiteCRM, Asterisk, Custom API, Billing, Workflow & 
BPMS (Processmaker)) 
• License Management System 
- Website ASP.NET MVC : Account/Customer/Order/License/Device/Version 
Management, History, Report  
- App version windows C# : Register/Recover 
License 
- App version linux Java (Ubuntu) : Register License from SD card Serial Number 
• Construction Company Website 
- Build site using Kentico EMS 
- License Check/Warranty 
• Digital Mapping Projects 
- ESRI ArcMap Add-in 
- TileMap Proxy 
- POI Editor 
- Image Recognition 
10/2013 – 11/2014: Product Manager at FELIX TECHNOLOGY JSC., 
Felix is one of the pioneer company in Vietnam providing Smart technology application  
solution system in online service and authentication management, look up the  products 
origin, E-warranty authentication, distribution system management,  brands promotion and 
customer care for the enterprises. Help enterprises reduce  the investment cost, easy to 
administrate with new trend. 
• App FelixVN 
- Description # application development on mobile; brand identity; authentic goods; 
advertising the brand, product introduction; promotions, customer management, customer 
care 
- In the beginning, I involved in the team to build a working environment that was effective 
and friendly 
- Development with Agile Method and Scrum. 
5  
05/2010 – 08/2013: Senior Developer at VIETMAP CO., LTD 
Development of LBS & Maps related projects 
• App Duahau 
- Description # Provide promotions, events of suppliers around users 
- App Android  
- Web ASP.NET MVC + jQuery Mobile 
• App SaigonBus 
- Description # The guide is based on all the bus transfers managed by SaigonBus 
- App Android  
- Web ASP.NET MVC + jQuery Mobile 
SOFT SKILL 
• Database analysis & designing 
• Team working /leading  
• Logical thinking  
• Independently working 
• Study Quickly 
• Problem-solving
